decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the
Site Location Plan, Drawing No. 3070-DR-3000-OS01, dated 10 July 2024
Existing and Proposed Casement Window Details, Drawing No. 3070-DR-8101, dated September 2024
Existing and Proposed Window Details,, Drawing No. 3070-DR-8102, dated September 2024
Existing Window and Door Schedule, Drawing No. 3070-DR-8102-P01, dated September 2024
Existing and Proposed Window Details,, Drawing No. 3070-DR-8102, dated September 2024
Proposed Window and Door Schedule, Drawing No. 3070-DR-8101-P01, dated 10 July 2024
Existing Side Elevations,, Drawing No. 3070-DR-3002-P01, dated 4 July 2024
Existing Rear Elevations, Drawing No. 3070-DR-3001-P01, dated 10 July 2024
Existing Front Elevation,, Drawing No. 3070-DR-3000-P01, dated 10 July 2024
Proposed Side Elevations,, Drawing No. 3070-DR-3102-P012, dated 15 July 2024
Proposed Rear Elevation,, Drawing No. 3070-DR-3101-P01, dated 10 July 2024
Proposed Front Elevation,, Drawing No. 3070-DR-3100-P01, dated 10 July 2024

Reason: For avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Replacement of existing single glazed or uPVC windows and doors with timber double glazed units.
